X-Line

Where Creative People and Ideas Grow Together

What We Do ?

XLine offers space, community and activities to creative people and ideas so that they can grow within a safe environment where they are not judged,discriminated against and where thay can be without limitations.

PARLIAMENT

the parliament will be responsible for organizing the mission, agendas, activities and projects of Xline, as well as ensuring that the Programs is acting in accordance with all X - line policies and guidelines. The Parliament also has the authority to establish committees within X - line for specific purposes and appoint their respective chairpersons. The head of the parliament is also responsible for marketing and expanding knowledge of Xline.


Council

The Xline council will be responsible for publishing subjects for the programmers and the users and the budget, reporting any actions taken on the budget at each meeting, requesting all appropriate check requisitions, making request for additional funds or allocations, and all other actions pertaining to the finances of X - line.

Information

The information sector shall record and distribute meeting minutes to all appropriate members, record all votes conducted by X - line, and keep an ongoing attendance spreadsheet. The Information sector will be responsible for records of members and X â€“ line functions.
